history: TTS !b <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break strength='strong' /> an assistant that gives you transportation directions. <break strength='strong' /> Your conversation will be recorded for research purposes to help improve our system. <break strength='strong' /> Your enkkkrrypted phone number will be stored in a secure manner and will not be shared with anyone. <break strength='strong' /> This is so we can keep your preferences for future calls. <break strength='strong' /> Your participation is voluntaaaaary. <break strength='strong' /> By continuing to use this system you confirm that you are at least 18 and that you agree that we may use the data we record for research. <break strength='strong' /> We may share the data with researchers, however no personal information will be shared. <break strength='x-strong' /> At any point in the conversation, you may ask me to repeat something or to pause. <break time='1s'/> </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER I'd like to take the bus.
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS What is your destination?
USER blah blah
TTS Where do you want to go?
USER blah blah
TTS I am having difficulty understanding. Please try giving a nearby street corner or monument. What is your destination?
USER Hello boy.
TTS I am having difficulty understanding. Please try giving a nearby street corner or monument. Where are you going?
USER I'm going to Carnegie Mellon University.
TTS Okay, going to carnegie mellon university. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where do you wanna leave from?
USER blah blah
TTS Okay, going to carnegie mellon university. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where are you leaving from?
USER I'm leaving from blah blah.
TTS I am having difficulty understanding. Please try giving a nearby street corner or monument. Where do you want to leave from?
USER We from the airport.
TTS Okay, leaving from pittsburgh international airport. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you want to travel
USER right now
TTS Okay, travelling at 09:55 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER Yes.

TTS <speak> Ok, great! <break strength='strong' /> I will pause after every step and give you time to write things down. <break strength='strong' /> Feel free to ask me to repeat a step, <break strength='weak' /> if you didn't catch it the first time. </speak>

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 1 hour 5 minutes, and you will take 1 bus.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 13 mins to Pittsburgh International airport lower level. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER continue
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Take the 28X to Forbes avenue Opposite Craig St. It will depart at 10:30pm. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER continue
TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 3 mins to 5000 Forbes avenue, Pittsburgh, PA 15213, USA. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Let me know when you're done writing. </speak>
USER okay you
TTS Thank you for using CMU Get Going. If you would like to plan another trip, say <break strength='weak' /> RESTART.
USER restart

TTS !b <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break strength='strong' /> an assistant that gives you transportation directions. <break strength='strong' /> Your conversation will be recorded for research purposes to help improve our system. <break strength='strong' /> Your enkkkrrypted phone number will be stored in a secure manner and will not be shared with anyone. <break strength='strong' /> This is so we can keep your preferences for future calls. <break strength='strong' /> Your participation is voluntaaaaary. <break strength='strong' /> By continuing to use this system you confirm that you are at least 18 and that you agree that we may use the data we record for research. <break strength='strong' /> We may share the data with researchers, however no personal information will be shared. <break strength='x-strong' /> At any point in the conversation, you may ask me to repeat something or to pause. <break time='1s'/> </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
